title: BBC.Wildlife.Meerkats.1of2.United.DVB.Xvid.MP3..avi
description:
Meerkats

Nature Documentary narrated by Sir David Attenborough and published by BBC broadcasted as part of BBC Wildlife series in 1987 - English narration
 <a href="
http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/8464/meerkatscoverwh0.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/8464/meerkatscoverwh0.jpg</a>

Information
------------------------------

Two documentaries about african meerkats. First broadcasted in 1987 and the follow up in 1996.


1)  United 
The tale of a gang of meerkats who, despite a hot and hostile landscape, manage to devise a way of coming out on top - by team work.

2)  Divided 
Following up from Meerkats United 17 years ago,this programme again looks at the life of the Meerkat.Tonight&#039;s film is set in idyllic African landscape and follows the Addo Gang(a family of Meerkats) and their dealings with various animal neighbours.
